alert.note: Alert for Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 05 at 9:24PM MDT until June 09 at 10:17AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Montana, including the following county, Valley. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 913 PM MDT, As of Monday evening on June 5th, Local law enforcement reported that water remains over Billingsly Road and Tampico Road near the landfill. - The river gague reading at Beaver Creek near Hinsdale shows a level of 14.54 feet and is falling fairly quickly. It is forecast to fall below the minor flood stage of 14.0 feet overnight tonight. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hinsdale, Tampico, Vandalia and The Bentonite Plant. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away from flooded roads and obey all posted road closures.
